Raleigh.Heck-Lee, Heck-Wynne, and Heck-Pool Hous: Heck-Lee, Heck-Wynne, and Heck-Pool Houses are three historic homes located at Raleigh, Wake County, North Carolina. They were built between 1871 and 1875, and are 1 1/2-story, "L"-shaped, Second Empire-style frame dwellings on brick foundations. They feature an Eastlake Movement wrap-around porch, a full-height mansard roof and a 2 1/2-story corner mansard tower.
